===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A sugar-coated or film-coated tablet used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to soothe sore throat, to nourish [[yin]], to promote the production of body fluids, and to counteract toxicity and quench fire
in the treatment of painful swelling of the throat, aphonia and upper respiratory tract inflammation".

Jianmin Yanhou tablets have the following herbal ingredients:
